project.name: Openmeetings
project.description: Parent project for all OpenMeetings Maven modules. Required to hold general settings

properties.sonar.exclusions: file:**/generated-sources/**, file:**/jquery-ui.css, file:**/fabric.js, file:**/cssemoticons.js, file:**/adapter-latest.js, file:**/kurento-utils.js, file:**/NoSleep.js, file:**/fileinput*.js, file:**/MathJax.js, file:**/network.js

patterns.pattern: licensed under the MIT and GPL
